predicate.note: Frames file for 'remand' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: send (a case) back to a lower court, or a prisoner back to prison

example.name: glad this showed all args
example.text: SciMed said the appeals court remanded the case back to the district court for further proceedings.

roleset.note: Use of DIR here is warranted because the 'back' was outside the to-phrase but formed a natural constituent. Otherwise extract the preposition as usual.
